relation: The title of the tooltip or an associative array with keys contained in {'title','image','text','href','alt'} and values corresponding to parameters of the same name.
The image for the tip, if no text is provided
An URL that will be used to create the link
The alt attribute for img tag
pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "API17:JHtml::tooltip" - Joomla! Documentation
textBeforeTable: public static JHtml::tooltip ($tooltip, $title= '', $image= 'tooltip.png', $text= '', $href= '', $alt= 'Tooltip', $class='hasTip')   Synopsis Since Description:JHtml::tooltip [Edit Descripton] Creates a tooltip with an image as button.
